title: Citi Cards CEO Jud Linville to Present at the 2014 Credit Suisse Financial Services Forum
summary: New York - Jud Linville, Chief Executive Officer of Citi Cards, will present at the 2014 Credit Suisse Financial Services Forum on Wednesday, February 12, 2014. The presentation is expected to begin at approximately 8 a.m. (Eastern). A live webcast and presentation materials will be available at www.citigroup.com/global/investors. A replay and transcript of the webcast will be available shortly after the event.
tag-1: Citi Cards CEO Jud Linville to Present at the 2014 Credit Suisse Financial Services Forum

tag-3: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
